app_descript:
App Name: Photoleap

Brief: Photoleap, by Lightricks, is a versatile photo editing and animation app designed to enhance, revitalized, and transform your images into stunning pieces of art. From retouching old snapshots to creating high-definition photos and generating AI art, Photoleap provides a range of tools for professional-level photo editing. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned photographer, this app breathes new life into your visual memories.
